overview: A tribute to front-line health-care workers who battling with the novel corona-virus disease (COVID-19) that is spreading rapidly throughout our world. Mary, a Memorial Hospital nurse, willing to sacrifice her own safety and well-being in this. From the struggles at work to the sacrifices at home, Mary must navigate this dangerous new world. Follow her as she selflessly does the job everyone else fears, all the while teaching us the necessity of protecting ourselves from the virus and the true honor of being a nurse.
title: Mary
